panels.description: Container CPU Throttled Time (CPU Throttled seconds), no data means sufficient CPU or no throttling applied
panels.title: Container CPU Throttling Time

panels.description: This metric will be missing due to a cAdvisor defect with Docker as the container runtime.[#link](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/migrating-from-dockershim/check-if-dockershim-removal-affects-you/#some-filesystem-metrics-are-missing-and-the-metrics-format-is-different)
panels.title: Read/Write Time per second

panels.description: Number of packets sent and received per second 1 p/s = 1000 mp/s
panels.title: Packet Transmission Rate

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.legendFormat: System - System processes running in the kernel
Nice - Niced processes running in user space
Steal - Time spent running other OSs in virtualization

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: App - Application usage in user space
PageTables - Memory used for virtual-to-physical memory mapping
SwapCache - Memory for pages retrieved from swap but not yet modified
Slab - Kernel memory used to cache data structures like inode, dentry
Buffers - Block device (e.g., hard disk) cache
Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM marked as damaged/not working by kernel

panels.title: Network Transfer Rate (Excluding Virtual and Loopback Interfaces)

panels.description: The proportion of total time spent on I/O operations, reflecting the system's busyness when handling I/O tasks
panels.title: I/O Utilization

list.definition: query_result( group by (node_name) (container_memory_rss{job_name="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor",pod=~"$pod",pod!=""}) or group by (node_name) ( kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name="$service_name",svc_name!=""}))
list.label: Related Nodes
list.name: related_nodes

query.query: query_result( group by (node_name) (container_memory_rss{job_name="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor",pod=~"$pod",pod!=""}) or group by (node_name) ( kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name="$service_name",svc_name!=""}))
